title: Quickstart
text: Now can initialize Poppy chat client. default, chat retrieve API key .Renviron. can also set API key directly initializing client passing api_key argument poppy_chat, recommended security reasons code shared published. default model Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5. can change model using model argument. learn chatting chat client, see ellmer.
code: poppy_llm_default <- poppy_chat()  poppy_llm_default$chat("Hi, who are you?") #> Hello! I'm a GenAI Digital Assistant hosted by the California Department of #> Technology (CDT) to support State of California employees.  #> #> I'm here to help you with: #> - Answering questions about state procedures, policies, and resources #> - Searching relevant documents and providing information #> - Assisting with work-related tasks and inquiries #> - Providing references to official documentation when available #> #> How can I assist you today? poppy_llm_gemini_25_flash <- poppy_chat(model = "Google Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite") poppy_llm_gemini_25_flash$chat("What does the California Department of Water Resources do, briefly?") #> The California Department of Water Resources (DWR) is responsible for  #> managing and protecting the California's water resources. They oversee flood #> control, water conservation, and the State Water Project, which delivers #> water across the state. #>  #> You can find more information on their official website:  #> [https://water.ca.gov/](https://water.ca.gov/) poppy_llm_gemini_25_flash$chat("Could you rephrase that, briefly and in plain language suitable for a middle school student?") #> Imagine California is a giant garden that needs lots of water to grow. The  #> Department of Water Resources is like the garden's caretaker! They make sure  #> there's enough water for everyone and everything – for drinking, for farms to  #> grow food, and to keep our rivers and lakes healthy. They also help protect #> us from floods, like building strong walls to keep rivers in their place when #> it rains a lot. #>  #> Think of them as the state's water helpers!

title: Poppy model catalog — poppy_models
text: Tibble large language models available Poppy endpoint, token limits, supported modalities, per-million-token pricing.

title: Poppy model catalog — poppy_models
text: tibble 10 rows 11 columns: model_name Model identifier expected Poppy API, used model argument poppy_chat(). provider Company providing model. description Short text summary model's capabilities, provided model provider. release_date Model release date ISO string; may missing unknown. input_token_limit Documented maximum input tokens; NA specified documentation. output_token_limit Documented maximum output tokens; NA specified documentation. max_token_limit Overall documented token limit; NA specified documentation. input_data_types Comma-delimited list supported input modalities. output_data_types Comma-delimited list supported output modalities. input_cost_1m Quoted input price USD per one million tokens. output_cost_1m Quoted output price USD per one million tokens.
